english.segment1: give love one to another. give love one to each other. and we'll be fine. we'll be fine
english.segment2: i feel alone, i feel so cold, when i'm apart from you for just one night. you keep me alive. feeling fine. when i've got something as good as you inside.
english.segment3: got nothing to lost been hanging in twos. but i need something to get me through this. nothing to lose been hanging in twos. but i need you to get me through this
english.segment4: there's no better time. than when i find You in a feeling. and know i'm doing alright. Nothing to hide, just to confide. when i've got something as good as You inside
english.segment5: what the world needs now. is a little know how. to turn itself right upside down
